summary: TL*THE CONTACT OWNS A 2007 HME AHRENS-FOX FIRE TRUCK.  THE CONTACT STATES WHILE DRIVING APPROXIMATELY 15 MPH ON NORMAL ROAD CONDITIONS. THE SECURED REAR PASSENGER DOOR UNLATCHED WITHOUT ASSISTANCE.  THE VEHICLE CONTINUED TO TRAVEL WITH CAUTION.  THERE WERE NO PRIOR WARNINGS.  A CERTIFIED TECHNICIAN INSPECTED THE VEHICLE.  THE FAILURE WAS CONTRIBUTED TO THE ROTARY LATCH  LOCK-SET.  THE PARTS WERE UNAVAILABLE SO THE VEHICLE IS NOT BEING DRIVEN DUE TO A  SAFETY HAZARD.  THE VEHICLE REMAINS INOPERABLE DUE TO THE LACK OF REPAIR PARTS.  THE FAILURE  AND CURRENT MILEAGE WERE 2,000.  THE VIN NUMBER WAS UNAVAILABLE WHICH WILL BE UPDATED UPON THE RECEIPT OF THE SAFETY COMPLAINT FORM.
